data.title: Etisalat Sri Lanka details
data.meta_description: FloppySend.com Offers solutions to unleash the full potential of SMS in your business in Sri Lanka with Etisalat Network, Register now for a Free test!
data.text:
The Etisalat Carrier From Sri Lanka is denoted by codes: 413 03. The followings IDs are called HNI (Home network identity). This code is created by the combination of two other Mobile Country Code (MCC) and Mobile Network Code (MNC). The first three numbers stand for the MCC and they are used in order to identify the region which the carried comes from (in the following example it’s Sri Lanka). The last numbers of the HNI code are equal with the MNC and this ID is given for the specific mobile network operator.

Besides Etisalat Sri Lanka has assigned country code + 94. This number + 94 is equal with international calling code and it’s simply the telephone dialing prefixes used for calling Etisalat numbers.

Etisalat uses 2 GSM bands, 1 UMTS bands, 0 and 0 CDMA bands.. You can read the specific frequency bands in the table below. All bands of the Etisalat are display in MHz units.

Another important information in Etisalat Sri Lanka architectures is the standard of used protocols. It also uses 3 protocols such as GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA. The ISO standard code of Etisalat is LK. You can see more info about this mobile network operator at http://www.etisalat.lk/. How to check Etisalat coverage? How to check if your phone will work in Sri Lanka?
